definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
ten months or so/about ten months

sentences.english: We were kept on tenterhooks for hours while the judges chose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐立不安了好几个小时，等着裁判们决定获胜者。

sentences.english: I lifted my right hand and made scissoring movements with my first two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我抬起右手，用食指和中指做了几个剪东西的动作。

sentences.english: Mr Green has been out of work for several months and is on his uppers.
sentences.chinese: 格林先生失业好几个月了，现在已过得山穷水尽。

sentences.english: Accessibly several different versions, oriented to different circle of tasks.
sentences.chinese: 通俗易懂的几个不同版本，面向不同圈子的任务。

sentences.english: Would like to see a few FB pages you have done.
sentences.chinese: 想看到你做了几个库务局网页。

sentences.english: The clothes designer chose several models to try on his newly designed clothes.
sentences.chinese: 服装设计师选了几个模特来试穿他新设计的服装。

sentences.english: Chinese mainland part of the film and television industry friends want to shoot some students in my class.
sentences.chinese: 中国大陆几个影视界的朋友想让我班部分同学拍戏。

sentences.english: We have several word letters that uses a series of forms to input into the doc.
sentences.chinese: 我们有几个字母词使用到文档形式输入一个系列。

sentences.english: Some people see this one, Aphrodite does not play on the air to one.
sentences.chinese: 一看到这几个人，阿芙罗狄忒就气不打一处来。

sentences.english: Only few States continue to maintain a separate chancery court.
sentences.chinese: 只有少数几个州继续保持独立的衡平法院。

sentences.english: She spent hours admiring herself in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 她用了几个小时对着镜子自我欣赏。

sentences.english: It rained yesterday after it had been dry for many months.
sentences.chinese: 在天旱了好几个月之后，昨天下雨了。

sentences.english: Few friends has she made since she came into this school last year.
sentences.chinese: 自从去年她来到这个学校，没交几个朋友。

sentences.english: Is cursed since the insect poisons general several months once returned to?
sentences.chinese: 狗的打虫药一般几个月给一回？

sentences.english: This eclipse will be difficult for a number of reasons.
sentences.chinese: 因为几个原因，这个月蚀将变得有些困难。

sentences.english: You may wonder how many of his peers would agree with him.
sentences.chinese: 你或许会好奇他的同行中有几个人赞同他的观点。

definition: some/a few/a little/(following an adjective) slightly ...er
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
